item.description:
Mid-Autumn Festival is one of Chinese favorite holiday, and it is the time to gather friends and family to celebrate fall harvest. Let's have our meetup on that special date, and we would enjoy eating, practicing Chinese, and celebrating the festival in Chinatown.

6:00pm-8:00pm: dinner at New Shanghai on Hudson St in Chinatown. We plan $10-$20 cash for the food. We will divide the check evenly. We'll need to RSVP responsibly as we'll need to make reservations. http://www.newshanghairestaurant.com/

group.name: The Boston Mandarin Chinese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Chinese Mid-Autumn Festival--Part A Dinner
